User Stories
=====================

* A front desk employee can search information about activities.
* A front desk employee can researve a room for a customer.
* A front desk employee can delete a reservation.
* A front desk employee can view reservations.
* A front desk employee can change a reservation.
* A front desk employee can record a customer's comment.
* A front desk employee can change a customer's comment.
* A front desk employee can delete a customer's comment.
* A front desk employee can view comments.
